author: suresh
msg: HDFS-1842. Change the layout version to -31 to disallow upgrade from and to 0.21 release. Contributed by Suresh Srinivas.

author: mcooper
msg: Use good practice of explicitly specifying a radix for the parseInt function so it doesn't accidentally get interpreted as hex (string starting with 0x or -0x) or octal (string starting with 0 or -0).
